Title: Establishes the Adirondack park affordable housing task force
Summary: Establishes the Adirondack park affordable housing task force; requires such task force to conduct a comprehensive review of affordable housing issues within the Adirondack park and to make recommendations for addressing such issues.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish the Adirondack park affordable housing task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
